files.patch: @@ -1256,1 +1256,4 @@ -It can be used action tags, for example:@run main ${test.main.class} +It is based on the simple test.file name without the .java +extension; prepended with an optional package name parsed from the source file. +Therefore, non-Java files aren't supported nor inner classes are detected. +It can be used in action tags, for example:@run main ${test.main.class}

@@ -37,2 +37,4 @@
-			> $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log)
-	$(GREP) -s 'Test results: passed: 7' $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log)  > /dev/null
+			> $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log); \
+		ls $(BUILDTESTDIR)
+	$(GREP) -s 'Test results: passed: 8; error: 1' $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log)  > /dev/null
+	$(GREP) -s 'Bad classname provided for .build.: ${test.main.class}' $(@:%.ok=%/work/optOut/Test3.jtr)  > /dev/null
